Description_lang: Infuses an Earthrager with Azerite, healing it for $271698s1% of its health every $271698t1 sec for $271698d. The Earthrager becomes empowered when the infusion finishes, freeing it from crowd control and increasing its damage done by $s6% and increasing their damage taken by $s7%. Also causes it to pulses Azerite energy every $t1 sec, inflicting $1213142s1 Arcane damage to all players.Prefers targets not under the effects of Fracking Totem or other crowd control effects.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage inflicted increased by $s6%.Damage taken increased by $s7%.Inflicts $1213142s1 Arcane damage to all players every $t1 sec.
